```{r setup, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(CSLSchem)
text_size    <- 12
lakes        <- c("Pleasant", "Long", "Plainfield")
SWIMS        <- CSLSchem::SWIMS
```

# Pleasant Lake

```{r psnt, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=6.5, fig.height=5, fig.align="center"}
lake     <- "Pleasant"
chem_bal <- calculate_chem_bal(lake)
plot_mass_in(chem_bal, text_size = text_size)
plot_mass_bal(chem_bal, lake, text_size = text_size)
```

# Long Lake

